instructions.1: Place squash in a large bowl and pour in creamy salad dressing. Cover and refrigerate for 30 minutes.
instructions.2: Remove squash from refrigerator and sprinkle in the parmesan cheese; mix to coat well. Stir in the flour, coating well.
instructions.3: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Carefully place squash in oil and fry until lightly browned. Turn once, and add onions. Fry until squash is browned on both sides. Using a slotted spoon, transfer squash and onions to paper towels to drain.

questions.question: Is parmesan cheese from Step 2 still available in Step 3?
Is creamy salad dressing live after Step 1?
What is the last time interval specified in Step 1?
